name: transax
description: Framework-agnostic JavaScript library for content internationalization.

scripts.gen: npm run gen:parsers && npm run gen:modules && npm run gen:typedoc
scripts.build:coverage: rm -rf coverage && node --experimental-vm-modules node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js --config jest.config.ts --collect-coverage && make-coverage-badge && sed -i 's/Coverage/coverage/g' coverage/badge.svg
scripts.build:docs: NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider vuepress build docs && cp -r coverage/lcov-report docs/.vuepress/dist/coverage && cp coverage/badge.svg docs/.vuepress/dist/coverage
scripts.run:docs: npm run gen:typedoc && NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider vuepress dev docs

author: Tony Bogdanov <support@tonybogdanov.com>
